name: Hotel Spero
description:
Hotel Spero at Union Square is in Union Square, a walkable area in San Francisco with good shopping. Cable Car Museum and Asian Art Museum of San Francisco are cultural highlights, and some of the area's notable landmarks include Dragon's Gate and Lombard Street. Hotel Spero at Union Square provides dry cleaning/laundry services, a bar, and a 24-hour gym. The on-site American cuisine restaurant, Jaspers Corner Tap, offers breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, and happy hour. Stay connected with in-room WiFi, with speed of 100+ Mbps (good for 1–2 people or up to 6 devices), and guests can find other amenities such as a 24-hour business center. Resort fee to be collected at time of check-in. 

San Francisco Museum of Modern Art - 13 min walk
Moscone Convention Center - 16 min walk
Lombard Street - 3 min drive
Ferry Building - 3 min drive
Oracle Park - 4 min drive

Restaurants
Cityscape Bar and Restaurant - 3 min walk
Pinecrest Diner - 3 min walk
Bourbon & Branch - 2 min walk
The Halal Guys - 1 min walk
Jones - 3 min walk

Other perks include:
Full breakfast (surcharge), smoke-free premises, and a 24-hour front desk
A banquet hall, 5 meeting rooms, and luggage storage
A porter/bellhop, tour/ticket assistance, and ATM/banking services

Room features
All 236 rooms offer comforts such as air conditioning, in addition to thoughtful touches like safes and WiFi. Guest reviews speak well of the clean, comfortable rooms at the property. 
Other conveniences in all rooms include:
Bathrooms with eco-friendly toiletries and shower/tub combinations
Wardrobes/closets, recycling, and coffee/tea makers

Optional extras
Fee for full breakfast: approximately USD 22 for adults and USD 22 for children
Nearby parking fee: USD 49 per night (20 ft away)
Pet fee: USD 75 per pet, per stay
Service animals are exempt from fees
Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability)
Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability)

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Oakland
description:
Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Oakland-Airport, an IHG Hotel is in an area with good airport proximity. Fox Theater and Greek Theater are cultural highlights, and some of the area's activities can be experienced at Berkeley Marina and Ferry Building. Consider a stay at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Oakland-Airport, an IHG Hotel and take advantage of a free breakfast buffet, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour gym. In addition to a 24-hour business center, guests can connect to free in-room WiFi. All 95 rooms include comforts such as air conditioning, in addition to thoughtful touches like free WiFi and safes. An ordinance fee of $11. 40 will be collected by hotel at time of check-in. 

Oracle Arena - 4 min drive
Rolling Loud Festival - 4 min drive
RingCentral Coliseum - 4 min drive
Oakland Zoo - 8 min drive
San Francisco Bay - 14 min drive

Restaurants
Raising Cane's Chicken Fingers - 18 min walk
In-N-Out Burger - 2 min drive
Jack In The Box - 2 min drive
Starbucks - 18 min walk
Starbucks - 9 min walk

Additional perks include:
Self parking (surcharge), a roundtrip airport shuttle (surcharge), and an electric car charging station

Pets not allowed

name: Knotts Berry Farm Hotel
description:
The comfortable Knotts Berry Farm Hotel is conveniently situated in Buena Park, within the Knotts Berry Farm theme park. It features a  a restaurant with a daily visits from Snoopy. Knott's Theme Park and Soak City Water Park are just steps away; the hotel offers a complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland Resort. Other attractions such as the Anaheim Convention Center, the Honda Center, home of the NHL team Mighty Ducks of Anaheim or the Angel stadium, home of the MLB team California Angels, are within a short drive.

Referbishment-
Updates as of 5/10/2023:
-Starting Thursday, May 11th, the pool will be closed Monday through Friday. 
The pool will reopen every Friday at 6pm and will remain open through Sunday.
-A limited guest room service menu is still available. Room service can be ordered between 4:00 PM and 10:00 PM daily for a limited time. Please contact (714) 243-2010 for more information.
-The hotel entrance is currently unavailable. Please follow the directional signs displayed in the parking lot.
-The Front Desk has relocated to the north side of the hotel.
-Guests can enter utilizing the pool entrance or the north entrance.
-The gift shop is currently unavailable. Guests can visit our Marketplace for alternative shopping locations.
-We no longer have a sports court available for guest use.
-The hotel restaurant is currently unavailable. Guests can visit our Marketplace for Chicken to Go, Chicken Dinner Restaurant, or TGI Fridays.
-The breakfast buffet has been temporarily relocated to the Chicken Dinner Restaurant. The buffet will only be available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for hotel guests. Breakfast vouchers are available for purchase through select packages or purchased onsite. (Must present hotel room keys when purchasing onsite) 
-The lobby area is currently unavailable.

name: Buena Park Grand Hotel and Suites
description: This missionary-style suite hotel is situated in the entertainment centre of Buena Park. The hotel lies about 2 minutes from Knott's Berry Farm and 8 km from Disney Land to which complimentary scheduled shuttle service is available.  Renovated in 2007, this air-conditioned hotel offers a newspaper stand, a conference room and a restaurant serving classic Californian cuisine. A complimentary car park is available.  The two-room suites all come with an en suite bathroom with hairdryer, an iron and ironing board, as well as a kitchen with a fridge and a microwave. Additional amenities include satellite/cable TV, 2 double beds or 1 king-size bed, as well as a living room with a sofa bed. The air conditioning and heating are individually adjustable.  The hotel grounds feature an open courtyard with a heated pool and spa and a fitness centre.

name: Westin New York Grand Central Hotel
description: With a stay at The Westin New York Grand Central, you'll be centrally located in New York, a 5-minute walk from Grand Central Terminal and 15 minutes by foot from Broadway. This luxury hotel is 0. 9 mi (1. 4 km) from Empire State Building and 1. 1 mi (1. 7 km) from Rockefeller Center. . Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center or make use of other amenities including a ballroom. . Make yourself at home in one of the 774 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Wireless internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. . Enjoy American cuisine at Amuse Marketplace & Bar, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Continental breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 11 AM for a fee. . Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 16 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. . Distances are displayed to the nearest 0. 1 mile and kilometer. Chrysler Building - 0. 3 km / 0. 2 mi- Grand Central Terminal - 0. 4 km / 0. 3 mi- United Nations Headquarters - 0. 6 km / 0. 3 mi- 5th Avenue - 0. 8 km / 0.

name: The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Times Square, The Wyndham New Yorker Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the The Wyndham New Yorker Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, sofa, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as fitness center. Discover all New York (NY) has to offer by making The Wyndham New Yorker Hotel your base.
